metadata.title: adidas Golf Print Shorts
features: Metallic Adidas performance logo at bottom left hem
Two front pockets and two back pockets
Born of Sport. Rooted in golf
description: Adidas Golf designs award-winning products across apparel, footwear and accessories for every golfer. Innovation is at the heart of everything do. No detail is spared, no scenario overlooked. We're always working to create the best in golf. It's our passion. We make sure all golfers are geared for more.
